snippet.description:
▶This 10 Min Standing Arms Workout targets to lose and get toned arms & armpit  fat. 
[No needed a Yoga mat, equipment, it could be done anywhere at home or in the gym)

snippet.title: How to Make Kor. Egg GimBap l Easy & Yummy Recipes l What I Eat for Delicious Healthy Food_ #shorts
snippet.description:
*Quick Egg GimBap Recipes (Based on one Roll Standard) #shorts 

1) Beat 3 eggs 
2) Add Salt to the eggs (3/1 table spoon)
3) Whisk your egg
4) Cooking oil and spread it around the pan, then pour the eggs into the pan to make omelette
5) Once you see that the omelette has formed a crispy edge, Begin Rolling
6) Cut into thin slices 
7) Rice Seasoning:  4/1 Tbsp Salt + 2/1 Tbsp Sesame oil + Sesame salt (Optional) 
8) Mix them well
9) Let's Roll Gimbap: Seaweed sheet on the mat (shiny side down)
10) Put the cooked rice sheet of gim on a bamboo mat with the shiny side down
11) Add the Eggs 
12)  Roll the seaweed 
13) paste some sesame oil
14) Slice kimbap into bite size pieces. 
♥Enjoy Your Meal♥
